name: MedicationUseStopTypeCodeLijst-to-MedicationStatementStatus
title: HCIM MedicationUseStopTypeCodeLijst to MedicationStatementStatus
description: Maps the HCIM MedicationUse release 2017 terminology for MedicationUseStopType to the FHIR STU3 terminology associated with `MedicationStatement.status`.
purpose: To aid in mapping from HCIM MedicationUse value set MedicationUseStopTypeCodeLijst to FHIR STU3 `MedicationStatement.status`.
